fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Redirect another player, causing them to target another.
- Trap another player, roleblocking them. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you redirect cannot be controlled, but if someone else tries to redirect them at the same time as you, both their ability and yours will fail.
- If you are controlled or redirected while trying to control someone, only your second target will change.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You gain 1 use Basic Defense and a use for your roleblocking ability upon being Upgraded.
- You will learn the role of players you redirect or roleblock.
- Your redirection will override any other attempt to redirect your target.
